answer:
The answer to this question is:

Saudi Arabia is a constitutional monarchy, a hereditary monarchy, and a very wealthy country with the largest oil reserves in the world. The King of Saudi Arabia is the supreme head of state and supreme commander of the armed forces. He also appoints the Prime Minister, who is the head of the Council of Ministers. The Council of State is also appointed by the King.
